<<<api>>>: StringTokenizer.nextToken
<<<code>>>:
StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer(str, " ");
String word = st.nextToken();
<<<explanation>>>:
StringTokenizer is a class in java.util package. It is used to break a string into tokens.
The constructor of StringTokenizer takes two arguments: the string to be tokenized and the delimiter.
The nextToken() method returns the next token.
The hasMoreTokens() method returns true if there are more tokens.
The countTokens() method returns the number of tokens.
